10 绘图技巧 10.1 3D绘图 10.2 函数绘制

10 绘图技巧 10.1 3D绘图 x和y是数值向量，z是矩阵，且z的列数与x的长度一致，行数与y的长度一致。 library(plotly) library(magrittr) x <- seq_len(nrow(volcano)) + 100 y <- seq_len(ncol(volcano)) + 500 plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~volcano) 10.2 函数绘制 # To plot functions without data, specify range of x-axis base <- ggplot() + xlim(-5, 5) base + geom_function(fun = dnorm) base + geom_function(fun = dnorm, args = list(mean = 2, sd = .5))
